# Recap

```{r, echo=FALSE, comment=NA}
c(1:5, 5:1)
```

--

- Method 1

```r
c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 5, 4, 3, 2, 1)

```
--

- Method 2

```r
c(1:5, 5:1)
```

--

- Name elements 

```{r}
a <- c(1:5, 5:1)
a
names(a) <- c("a1", "a2", "a3", "a4", "a5", "b1", "b2", "b3", "b4", "b5")
a
```

---

## Operations between vectors 

```{r}
a 
a * c(10, 100)
```

- Types of vectors


---
## Vectors: Subsetting

```{r, comment=NA}
myvec <- 1:20; myvec
```

--

```{r, comment=NA}
myvec[1]
```

--
```{r, comment=NA}
myvec[5:10]
```

--
```{r, comment=NA}
myvec[-1]
```
--

```{r, comment=NA}
myvec[myvec > 3]
```

---

## Vectors: Subsetting

Extract elements present in vector `a`

```{r, comment=NA}
a
myvec
myvec %in% a
myvec[myvec %in% a]
```
--

```{r}
b <- 100:105
myvec[myvec %in% b]
```
